subsection.name: JCR repository factory
subsection.p: The default JCR repository must be set under the following JNDI address: "jcr/repositoryFactory".

subsection.name: BeanFactory
subsection.p: The default BeanFactory must be set under the following JNDI address: "jcr/beanFactory".

subsection.name: Traverser
subsection.p: The default traverser ID must be set under the following JNDI address: "jcr/traverser/default"

subsection.name: ItemFilter
subsection.p: The default filter ID must be set under the following JNDI address: "jcr/filter/default"

subsection.name: ItemComparator
subsection.p: The default sort ID must be set under the following JNDI address: "jcr/comparator/default"

subsection.name: TemplateEngine
subsection.p: The default template Engine ID must be set under the following JNDI address: "jcr/template/engine/default"

subsection.name: SizeCalculator
subsection.p: The default SizeCalculator ID must be set under the following JNDI address: "jcr/size/default"

subsection.name: Login
subsection.p:
This information is used when no user and password is provided in jcr:session tag, and the user is not logged through container managed security.
The default user name must be set under the following JNDI address: "jcr/login/anonuser"
The password for the default user must be set under the following JNDI address: "jcr/login/anonpwd"
